name: 1962: the War in the Hills
description: 1962: the War in the Hills is a TV series starring Karim Hajee, Pravin Bhosale, and Hemant Koumar. In the Sino-Indian War, 126 Indians defended a strategic pass against 3,000 enemy soldiers. This was a battle of dauntless courage,...

review.name: Standard of series suits 1962 only, not 2021
review.reviewBody: They made the series like a daily soap. Didn't bother about any details. Army going for war without combat dress, no local accent for soldiers, for Chinese they gave a disclaimer itself about them speaking Hindi. Seems no relation to what actually may have happened actually. Disappointed.

trailer.name: Official Trailer
trailer.description: In 1962, 125 Indian soldiers were outnumbered, but not defeated. Get ready to watch the story of an epic battle that changed the course of the war. 1962: The War In The Hills, all episodes out on Feb 26.
